section.p: offers the following options for handling your revenue share from your customers' service usage:

ul.li: You can view the revenue share that is defined.
You can retrieve and export information on the actual revenue.

section.p: For details, refer to the following sections. You can also use reports for retrieving information on your actual revenue. For details, refer to .

section.title: Viewing the Revenue Share
section.p: You can view the percentage you are entitled to keep from the total revenue generated by a service.
For this purpose, use the Define publishing options menu option in the Marketable service menu of the administration portal.

section.title: Exporting Revenue Share Data
section.p: To retrieve information on your actual revenue for a specific time frame, allows you to export the corresponding data. To do this, use the Export billing data menu option in the Account menu of the administration portal.

The data can be saved to an XML file or opened in an editor of your choice. You can edit it and work with it as required. The data can, for example, be forwarded to an accounting system. Depending on your contracts with the operator, the marketplace owner, and the suppliers, you can use it for paying them their respective shares, or for forecasting the shares that they will collect from you.
